hadith.chapterTitle: Remembrance of Death and Restraint of Wishes
hadith.body:
Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "Remember more often the destroyer of pleasures - death."

[At-Tirmidhi, who classified it as Hadith Hasan].
- وعنه قال‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم‏:‏ “أكثروا ذكر هاذم اللذات” ‏(‏‏(‏يعنى الموت‏)‏‏)‏ ‏(‏‏(‏رواه الترمذى وقال‏:‏ حدث حسن‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
